column4: Is there some program that can detect if I have the right drivers or not for my computer?
similar to driver genius for windows
because I'm pretty sure I don't have the correct drivers for this machine's video card
why does it say access denied?
Everything was working fine before I reinstalled OS on the computer
now like I can't do anything 3D
what are you trying to run?
it says  Capabilities: <access denied> under some stuff
yeah, I guess you need to run that as: sudo lspci -v
that likely means that regular users do not have the rights to probe hardware for certain things - doesn't necessarily mean you can't use em for 3d apps
renzo17, here is the more complete lspci -v http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/36429/
